question: Who is Vice-Chancellor
answer: Prof. (Dr.) Girish Chandel, Presently serving as Vice-Chancellor, IGKV, Raipur, C.G. from 25.02.2022.

question: How many Colleges in IGKV
answer: To know the Colleges in IGKV, visit this link https://igkv.ac.in/web/college_list.aspx Where you will get all colleges detail

question: How many Departments in IGKV
answer: Indira Gandhi Krishi Vishwavidyalaya (IGKV) has several specialized departments, focusing on various aspects of agricultural sciences. Currently, IGKV has 20 departments, including Agri-Business Management, Agricultural Economics, Agricultural Extension, Agricultural Microbiology, Agricultural Statistics, Agrometeorology, Agronomy, Entomology, Floriculture and Landscape, Forestry, Fruit Science, Genetics and Plant Breeding, Plant Molecular Biology and Biotechnology, Plant Pathology, Plant Physiology, Soil Science and Agricultural Chemistry, Vegetable Science, Visit this link https://igkv.ac.in/web/Departments.aspx to get detail
